name: 's Café am Markt
description:
It's the beginning of the 20th century in the United States. The industrialization is in full swing and the American dream is still alive. The ideal opportunity to start a business! Manage purchasing, production and prices of your charming cafe - while exploring the small town anno 1900 and learning new recipes.

The game is playable but further extensions are planned.  These include expanding the café into a delicatessen empire with the possibility to purchase land and build factories.
